Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class PhoneValidationServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.PhoneValidationServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhoneValidationServiceInterface
@Service public class PhoneValidationServiceImpl extends Object implements PhoneValidationServiceInterface
Service implementation for validating phone numbers.

This service uses Google's libphonenumber library to validate and format phone numbers according to the region and ensures that no duplicate phone numbers exist in the system.

Key Features:

  • Validates phone numbers using regional formats.
  • Formats phone numbers to international standards.
  • Checks for phone number duplication in the database.

Dependencies:

  • UserRepository - For checking phone number uniqueness in the database.
  • PhoneNumberUtil - For parsing, validating, and formatting phone numbers.

Exception Handling:

Throws IncorrectPhoneNumberException for invalid or duplicate phone numbers.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

      Validates and formats a phone number for updating user information.

      Throws:
      com.google.i18n.phonenumbers.NumberParseException - if the phone number cannot be parsed
